Description: Fairfax, Va.-based skilled nursing facility Fairfax Nursing Center and its owners have agreed to pay $700,000 to resolve allegations that they violated the False Claims Act by knowingly submitting or causing the submission to Medicare of false claims for non-reimbursable rehabilitation therapy services.

Info Source: Included in a dataset downloaded at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_summary.php
Notes: Company is plan administrator. Penalty amount reported in range of $10,001 to $50,000.
